column1: '''Myrtle Burrows''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
She was the third child and only daughter of [[Milo Burrows
column3: Peony Burrows]]. When she was eight years old, with her family, she was present at the [[Bilbo's Farewell Party

column2: genus of plants]] with evergreen leaves, white-pink flowers and fragrant berries. The name derives from ancient Greek ''μύρτος'' through Latin.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/myrtus#Etymology Wiktionary entry]''</ref>
